a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: World crude oil price vs. oil consumption, World
Global crude oil price, measured in US dollars per cubic meter, against total oil consumption, measured in
average cubic meters per day. Prices are adjusted for inflation.
Data source: Energy Institute based on S&P Global Platts - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024); Our World In Data; Energy
Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024)
Note: Prices are expressed in constant 2022 US$.
